  • Uses of LogFormatter.Builder in io.jstach.rainbowgum

    Methods in io.jstach.rainbowgum that return LogFormatter.Builder
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    LogFormatter.Builder
    LogFormatter.Builder.add(LogFormatter formatter)
    Adds a formatter.
    static LogFormatter.Builder
    LogFormatter.builder()
    See LogFormatter.builder().
    LogFormatter.Builder
    LogFormatter.Builder.event(LogFormatter.EventFormatter formatter)
    Adds an event formatter.
    LogFormatter.Builder
    LogFormatter.Builder.keyValue(String key, @Nullable String fallback)
    Creates a formatter that will print a single key value in percent encoding (RFC 3986 URI aka the format usually used in URI.getQuery()).
    LogFormatter.Builder
    LogFormatter.Builder.keyValues()
    Creates a formatter that will print ALL of the key values by percent encoding (RFC 3986 URI aka the format usually used in URI.getQuery()).
    LogFormatter.Builder
    LogFormatter.Builder.keyValues(List<String> keys)
    Creates a formatter that will print the key values in order of the passed in keys if they exist in percent encoding (RFC 3986 URI aka the format usually used in URI.getQuery()).
    LogFormatter.Builder
    LogFormatter.Builder.level()
    Adds the default level formatter.
    LogFormatter.Builder
    LogFormatter.Builder.loggerName()
    Adds the default logger name formatter.
    LogFormatter.Builder
    LogFormatter.Builder.message()
    Formats the message by calling LogEvent.formattedMessage(StringBuilder).
    LogFormatter.Builder
    LogFormatter.Builder.newline()
    Appends a newline using the platforms line separator.
    LogFormatter.Builder
    LogFormatter.Builder.space()
    Appends a space.
    LogFormatter.Builder
    LogFormatter.Builder.text(String content)
    Appends static text.
    LogFormatter.Builder
    LogFormatter.Builder.threadId()
    Appends a thread ID : Thread.threadId().
    LogFormatter.Builder
    LogFormatter.Builder.threadName()
    Appends a thread name : Thread.getName().
    LogFormatter.Builder
    LogFormatter.Builder.throwable()
    Appends the events throwable stack trace.
    LogFormatter.Builder
    LogFormatter.Builder.timeStamp()
    Append the timestamp in ISO format.
    LogFormatter.Builder
    LogFormatter.Builder.timeStamp(DateTimeFormatter dateTimeFormatter)
    Formatter for LogEvent.timestamp() derived from standard DateTimeFormatter.
